entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap Tourmente 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: ENE 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:15 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
